message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CY, cs.SI 

This paper deals with natural language processing (NLP) and machine learning techniques to automatically create an empathy lexicon. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language), which deals with NLP and related topics. The paper also uses deep learning methods, which makes cs.LG (Machine Learning) another likely sub-category. Additionally, the paper deals with the problem of learning word ratings from higher-level supervision, which falls under cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). The paper also uses clustering techniques, which could fall under cs.CY (Computers and Society) or cs.SI (Social and Information Networks).
